vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall

Unitroller.fallback (CEtherHarness.sol#2998-3013) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (CEtherHarness.sol#3000-3002)

UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (CEtherHarness.sol#2736-2738) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- adminOrInitializing (CEtherHarness.sol#4409-4413)

	-transfer (CEtherHarness.sol#1208)
	-transferFrom (CEtherHarness.sol#1222)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
Comp._writeCheckpoint (CEtherHarness.sol#3276-3289) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

	- require(bool)(err == MathError.NO_ERROR)
